alert.note: Alert for Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:27PM MDT until July 01 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LAS ANIMAS COUNTY... At 226 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gulnare, or 14 miles northwest of Trinidad, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storm has had a previous history of producing severe hail. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gulnare. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
